reviews.title: Susan
reviews.text:
Say ğŸ‘‹ to my friend Susan!
I have Ava to thank for this beautiful story ğŸ˜‰ Susan was Avaâ€˜s resource teacher years ago and introduced the 2 of us, and the happily ever after Plexus story that continues to unfoldâ€¦ It would be near impossible to ever pick a â€œfavoriteâ€ testimony story, they are all beautiful in and of themselves #justlikekids ğŸ™‚
But this one certainly hits my heart. Susan is a beautiful example of what commitment, and belief in her products look like She trusted her â€œgutâ€ and how much better she was feeling, long before she trusted the scale. #itsjustanumber In my eyes, she is a Plexus poster child, committed to the process, belief in herself and went ALL IN to make things happen.
Take a peak at what comes with using products consistently, incorporating the #gym when she was ready to â€œup her gameâ€ and fight for better health and wellness!!! Take a peek at her pictures in the comments for more wğŸ˜w moments!!!

ğŸ‘‡ğŸ»ğŸ‘‡ğŸ»ğŸ‘‡ğŸ»

â€œFull disclosure hereâ€¦these two pics were taken exactly 1 year apartâ€¦Christmas Day 2020 vs. Christmas Day 2021.

I was at the age where I was beginning to get several baseline tests done before the real aging began and I didnâ€™t like what I saw, heard, and/or read. Numbers not where I wanted them, osteopenia in the hips (told to start weight training which I had NEVER really done) and the scale constantly creeping up and up with very little change in what I ate. This couldnâ€™t really be happening to me! Iâ€™ve got a lot of living to do yet. So, bring on March 2020 as I took the first step into a gym to meet with a highly recommended trainer, thank you @angelabeckius at OurFitClub! She had me starting the next day, WHAT? ğŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸
No time like the present!! That was the real beginning of my transformation journey. Since March (9 months time) I have entered that same gym at least 3-4 times each week. I have gained so much knowledge about myself, #fitness, confidence, the importance of #supplementation and a whole community of like minded supportive people!

I have also been very consistent with my Plexus productsâ€¦a healthy gut is a happy gut! Because of Plexus I have found #migraine relief, I use the bathroom daily ğŸ’©, #sleep like a teenager and have the #energy to keep up with my intermediate 5th and 6th grade students *and keep a smile on my face while doing so!!!
Since last March, I have also lost inches and poundsâ€¦but this is just the beginning! 2022 marks a major birthday for me and I still have goals to meet before then!

So I say, just start, trust the process and be #consistent. Thatâ€™s the best gift you can give to yourself and your loved ones! Stay tuned!â€

SUSAN - WAY ğŸ‘ğŸ»TO ğŸ‘ğŸ»GO!!!! Your story and all those you now help is beyond inspiring! So proud of you!

reviews.title: Casey
reviews.text:
Say hello to my good friend, Casey Blair. Casey and I went to college together, and we had not spoken in decades, until #enterPlexus. â˜ºï¸

Iâ¤ï¸myjob

â€œThe scale victory is magnificent. ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»
All 150 pounds of it!!!
But let me tell you all the things you cannot see.

I am able to be the dad I want to be again. Iâ€™m a participant in my life, versus watching my life go by. And I have the joy that comes with waking up every day free from pain, free from medication, eager to live. Iâ€™m active and more happy than I have ever been! All because I said yes, and because I decided yo make a change. Vicky said â€œtrust meâ€, so I did. And have never looked back.

Whatâ€™s the magic, you ask? No magic.Â Â This is what happens with trusting the process, being coachable, products that work #science staying consistent, drinking my water, beginning to move my body again, and patience.

Was it easy? Nope. Plexus is a tool, not a quick fix. Heal your gut, get your blood sugars balanced, address inflammation, and make slow and steady lifestyle shifts.
Plexus WILL change your life. Plexus works. Period.

I watched Vicky for years, until I decided it was MY time. Iâ€™m so glad I did. ALL the good things in life are worth fighting for, your health being one of them!!!Â Â If I can do it, trust me, you can too! Make the call friends, make the change! You wonâ€™t be sorry!â€
